Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not before); LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Amulet
Description: A finely modelled and detailed amulet of the hippopotamus goddess Taweret, made from a pale faience bearing traces of red-brown colour. She stands in characteristic upright pose with both arms at her sides and the left leg forward. Taweret was protectress of pregnant women and childbirth. On the top of her head is a decorative loop for suspension.
